title: Wife Works w/ My Ex-Girlfriend & It's Causing Tension
description:
In this episode, we’re talking with a husband who thinks it’s weird that his wife and his ex work together, a new therapist who wants to help first responders, and a wife who wants to best support her husband as he starts trauma therapy.
  My wife works with my ex-girlfriend & it’s creating tension between us
 How can I help first responders as a new therapist?
 How can I support my husband as he’s going through trauma therapy?
 Lyrics of the Day: "All These Things That I've Done" - The Killers
